statements: SELECT * FROM PopulationDensity;
SELECT region_id, population_count FROM PopulationDensity WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT population_count, region_id FROM PopulationDensity ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM PopulationDensity WHERE coordinates LIKE '%35.6895° N, 139.6917° E%';
SELECT AVG(population_count) as avg_population FROM PopulationDensity;
SELECT * FROM PopulationDensity;
SELECT region_id, population_count, coordinates FROM PopulationDensity WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT population_count, region_id FROM PopulationDensity WHERE population_count > 1000 ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT region_id, population_count FROM PopulationDensity WHERE coordinates LIKE '%52.24%';
SELECT AVG(population_count) AS avg_population FROM PopulationDensity WHERE region_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT region_id, region_name, population_density FROM regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, population_density FROM regions WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE population_density > 100;
SELECT region_id, region_name, population_density FROM regions WHERE population_density BETWEEN 50 AND 150;
SELECT region_id, region_name, population_density FROM regions ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT region_id, region_name, population_density FROM regions ORDER BY population_density DESC;
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE population_density > 1000;
SELECT region_name, population_count, year FROM regions JOIN population_data ON regions.region_id = population_data.region_id WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT AVG(population_count) AS average_population FROM population_data GROUP BY region_id HAVING average_population > 50000;

SELECT region_id, region_name, population_density, year, population_count FROM regions JOIN population_data ON regions.region_id = population_data.region_id ORDER BY population_density DESC, year ASC;
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT region_name, population FROM region WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, year FROM population_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT region_id, population_density FROM population_data ORDER BY population_density DESC;
SELECT region_id, heatmap_id FROM heatmap WHERE heatmap_id < 5;
SELECT region_name, population FROM region WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY region_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM population_data WHERE year >= 2020 ORDER BY population_density DESC, year ASC;
SELECT region_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM population_data GROUP BY region_id ORDER BY total_records DESC;

SELECT region.region_name, population_data.year, heatmap.heatmap_image FROM region JOIN population_data ON region.region_id = population_data.region_id JOIN heatmap ON region.region_id = heatmap.region_id ORDER BY region.region_name ASC, population_data.year DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT region_name, population FROM region WHERE population BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY population DESC, region_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM regions WHERE region_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM population WHERE population_count > 100000 ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT region_id, latitude, longitude FROM coordinates ORDER BY region_id ASC;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM regions ORDER BY region_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM population WHERE population_count > 100000 ORDER BY population_id;
SELECT region_id, latitude, longitude FROM coordinates WHERE latitude BETWEEN -10.0 AND 10.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -60.0 AND -50.0;
SELECT heatmap_id, region_id, JSON_EXTRACT(heatmap_data, '$.heatmap_type') AS heatmap_type FROM heatmaps WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(heatmap_data, JSON_ARRAY('heatmap');
SELECT region_id, AVG(population_count) AS avg_population FROM population GROUP BY region_id HAVING avg_population > 50000;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM regions WHERE region_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%' AND region_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, density_value FROM regions JOIN population_density ON regions.region_id = population_density.region_id WHERE population_count > 1000000;
SELECT regions.region_name, demographics.median_age FROM regions JOIN demographics ON regions.region_id = demographics.region_id ORDER BY demographics.median_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE region_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT regions.region_name, geographical_coordinates.latitude, geographical_coordinates.longitude FROM regions JOIN geographical_coordinates ON regions.region_id = geographical_coordinates.region_id;
